tool_description: parses a given URL and returns a structured summary, including keywords, industry, location, contact details, product/services list, and more. It supports tasks like data enrichment, business intelligence, competitor analysis, and SEO, using advanced machine learning techniques to distill complex web content into usable data.
name: site2json
title: site2json

api_list.name: site2json
api_list.description: Send the url and get json
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://site2json.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "site2json.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://site2json.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "site2json.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
